Class MatchingEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • MatchingEngine

  • public class MatchingEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles order creation, modification, and cancellation. Also deals with trades and provides agents with appropriate trade data from the last millisecond of trading. *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,Agent> agentMap
      All the agents in the simulation, indexed by agent ID.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Order> allOrders
      All the orders in the simulation, unsorted.
      private long buyPrice
      The buy price for a share.
      private int lastAgVolumeBuySide
      The volume of shares sold that were initiated by an aggressive buying agent in the last millisecond of trading.
      private int lastAgVolumeSellSide
      The volumes of shares sold that were initiated by an aggressive selling agent in the last millisecond of trading.
      private double lastTradePrice
      The price that the share was last traded at.
      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Long> midpoints
      Queue containing the midpoints of best bid and best ask prices.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<Order>> orderMap
      All the orders in the simulation, grouped by agent ID.
      private boolean startingPeriod
      Remains true while the simulator is still in the starting period.

    • Field Detail

      • orderMap

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.ArrayList<Order>> orderMap
        All the orders in the simulation, grouped by agent ID.

      • agentMap

        private final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Long,Agent> agentMap
        All the agents in the simulation, indexed by agent ID.

      • allOrders

        private final java.util.ArrayList<Order> allOrders
        All the orders in the simulation, unsorted.

      • lastAgVolumeBuySide

        private int lastAgVolumeBuySide
        The volume of shares sold that were initiated by an aggressive buying agent in the last millisecond of trading.

      • lastAgVolumeSellSide

        private int lastAgVolumeSellSide
        The volumes of shares sold that were initiated by an aggressive selling agent in the last millisecond of trading.

      • lastTradePrice

        private double lastTradePrice
        The price that the share was last traded at. This should be plotted every time it is updated (i.e. whenever a trade occurs).

      • startingPeriod

        private boolean startingPeriod
        Remains true while the simulator is still in the starting period. This means that all orders that my result in a trade will be cancelled.

      • buyPrice

        private final long buyPrice
        The buy price for a share.

      • midpoints

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Long> midpoints
        Queue containing the midpoints of best bid and best ask prices. The length of the list is determined by the get moving average method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchingEngine

        public MatchingEngine(long buyPrice)
        Creates a matching engine with empty fields. Everything is initialized to zero.

    • Method Detail

      • cancelOrder

        public void cancelOrder(Order o)
        Deletes an order from the simulation (orderMap and allOrders).
        Parameters:
        o - The order to be removed.
        agentID - ID of the agent whose order is to be removed.

      • addNewAgent

        public void addNewAgent(long id,
               Agent agent)
        Inserts the agent into the MatchingEngine's agentMap so that it can keep track of it. This is called every time a new agent is constructed so it should not have to be explicitly called.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the agent.
        agent - Agent object to be added.

      • createOrder

        public boolean createOrder(Order o)
        Takes a newly created order and stores it in the MatchingEngine's allOrders and orderMap so that it can keep track of it. Also checks if any trade occurs from this newly created order.
        Parameters:
        o - New order to be inserted into the MatchingEngine.
        agentID - ID of the agent that initiated the order.

      • tradeMarketOrder

        public void tradeMarketOrder(Order o)

      • trade

        private int trade(Order o1,
        Order o2)

      • modifyOrder

        public boolean modifyOrder(Order o,
                  long newPrice,
                  int newQuant)
        Modifies the order in the MatchingEngine's allOrders and orderMap. Also checks if any trade occurs from this modification.
        Parameters:
        o - Order being modified.
        newPrice - The new price the order should have.
        newQuant - The new quantity the order should have.

      • getLastTradePrice

        public double getLastTradePrice()
        Returns:
        The last price that a share was traded for. Used primarily as data for the bar chart.

      • topBuyOrders

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> topBuyOrders()
        Returns:
        The top ten pending buy orders sorted by price (highest) and time of order creation (most recent).

      • topSellOrders

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> topSellOrders()
        Returns:
        The top ten sell orders sorted by price (lowest) and time of order creation (most recent).

      • willTrade

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> willTrade(Order order)
        Checks if an order will make cause a trade.
        Parameters:
        order - The order to check for a trade
        Returns:
        Orders that have the same price, if a trade can be made. Otherwise, null.

      • trade

        public boolean trade(Order order,
            java.util.ArrayList<Order> samePricedOrders)
        Performs the trade for non-market orders. If samePricedOrders is null, i.e. the order will not make a trade, then routine simply exits.
        Parameters:
        order - The order to be traded.
        samePricedOrders - Orders having the same price as the order to be traded.
        Returns:
        True if the trade was made.

      • getBestBid

        public Order getBestBid()
        Returns:
        The order with the highest bid price.

      • getBestAsk

        public Order getBestAsk()
        Returns:
        The order with the lowest ask price.

      • getAllOrders

        public java.util.ArrayList<Order> getAllOrders()
        Returns:
        All orders in the simulation.

      • setStartingPeriod

        public void setStartingPeriod(boolean isStartingPeriod)
        Sets the matching to allow or disallow trades to occur based on whether or not the simulation is still running in startup mode.
        Parameters:
        isStartingPeriod - If true, then the simulation will remain under startup mode and trades will not be allowed. Otherwise, trades will be enabled.

      • getBuyPrice

        public long getBuyPrice()
        Returns:
        The buy price for a share.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets lastAgVolumeBuySide and lastAgVolumeSellSide for the next millisecond

      • storeMovingAverage

        public void storeMovingAverage(int n)
        A special method for opportunistic traders that returns the moving average for the last n number of milliseconds.

      • getMovingAverage

        public long getMovingAverage()
        Provides agents with the moving average with length of time specified by the calculateMovingAverage() method.
